import React from 'react' import supersData from '../src/data/batman.json' import { Button, Card, CardActionArea, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Typography} from '@material-ui/core' import batman from '../src/assets/images/batman.jpeg' const superheroes = supersData.results[0].members const heroName = superheroes.reduce((acc, superhero) => { //const powers = acc.durability === "55" ? 'Batman' : 'Superman' return acc.name > superhero.name ? acc : superhero }) //ternary operator: condition ? true : false function Superheroes(){ return(

Superheroes

Name: {heroName.name}

{ superheroes.map(superhero => { return ( Lizard Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000 species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica ) }) }
) } export default Superheroes
